subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Once again!

full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0036_01C9C582.7A19EEB0

Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

"As for the people who want your inventions, I say... "Make your own"! It's=
 one thing for someone to recreate something that's already been created, b=
ut quite another to want something for nothing (and then use it for persona=
l gain as well)."

Yeah...I agree. Especially if they are just going to tur=
n around and crap on Frank for it later. No good deed goes unpunished.

Or =
Frank should start charging for them.

April

  ----- Original Message ----=
- 
  From: Angie 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, April 24, =
2009 10:02 AM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Once again!





  My long standing =
motto has been "Eff 'em if they can't take a joke". There are so many peopl=
e faking evidence and no one calls them out for it. EVP is electronic voice=
 PHENOMENA. It's up to the listener to decide what is, where it comes from =
and what it means. Ultimately, there's no way to know where the messages ar=
e coming from or what is being conveyed. It's just there. 

  I also agree =
that who says ghosts, spirits, aliens, whatever can't have a sense of humor=
? I know that if I were out there "haunting" someplace and had any say abou=
t it, I'd be doing silly things. I've often said to my husband that if he o=
utlives me and weird stuff starts happening, it's me messing with him. 

  =
I understand your anger, though. Why is it that in certain fields and areas=
 of interst that everyone is an "expert". I'm the first one to admit I'm a =
newbie. I'm skeptical, but find paranormal research fascinating.

  As for =
the people who want your inventions, I say... "Make your own"! It's one thi=
ng for someone to recreate something that's already been created, but quite=
 another to want something for nothing (and then use it for personal gain a=
s well).

  Angie

  --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purple=
aliengirl@...> wrote:
  >
  > I was on the group My Para, supposedly a soci=
al network for paranormal
  > researchers, even cut and paste Haliday is on=
 there telling everyone he has
  > the longest history in EVP. So I post th=
at duck voice under most amusing
  > EVPs, and apparently got banned from t=
he group for that. I have had enough
  > of every friggin' idiot with a com=
puter trying to be the worlds only
  > EVP/Paranormnal expert, thinking the=
y can judge what's real evidence. I
  > absolutely refuse to make anymore b=
oxes so some egomanic dweeb can set
  > themselves up as the big expert.
  =
> 
  > 
  > 
  > This mostly falls on deaf ears, cuz everyone out there is =
too busy trying
  > to be TAPS, and chasing limelights, not ghosts, and cer=
tainly not any
  > knowledge!
  >
